alert.note: Alert for Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 4:38PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...SHOWERS WITH SMALL HAIL WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL HUMBOLDT AND SOUTHWESTERN DEL NORTE COUNTIES THROUGH 500 PM PST... At 435 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking showers capable of producing small hail along a line extending from 6 miles west of Jack McNamera Field to Crescent City North to near Jedediah Smith State Park. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Slow down. Hail may rapidly accumulate on roads and create slippery driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Klamath, Jedediah Smith State Park, Jack McNamera Field, Bertsch-Oceanview, Crescent City North, Requa, and Klamath Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Del Norte; Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior
